title: The Grand Census Report
description: Create a complete report: district, count of citizens, and average age, sorted by count.
story: The mayor needs a comprehensive report! Combine everything you've learned: group by district, count citizens, calculate average age, and order by population. This is your final exam!
hint: Use GROUP BY with multiple aggregate functions (COUNT and AVG), then ORDER BY the count.
